index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Finance General; establishing 1988 expenditure allowances for certain employee incentive programs in the 1988 budgets of the Department of Human Resources, the Department of Construction and Land Use, the Engineering Department and the City Treasurer's Department by the reduction, reappropriation, and transfer of amounts previously appropriated in the 1988 budget Employee Incentive Program.
